fields.content: This is a simple responsive site, powered by Django. The site is a pet project that uses all of the applications explained in this entry.

fields.first_text: The above video is also controlled via the CMS. Simply grab the url for a video, copy it into the CMS, save it and it will appear on the site in seconds.  If you would like to test out the admin send me a request via email.
fields.second_text: I am a self-taught web developer as well as a QA professional. I write automated tests, manage various projects and coordinate releases (via code management and review) to production weekly.
fields.third_text: Tons of stuff!   First IE support, then I will create more pages that go into more detail about the technologies rendering the site.  After that, forms, a blog, site search and design enhancements happening along the way.

fields.title: The Most Astounding Fact - Neil deGrasse Tyson
